dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Welcome to the world of Elyria, a land of ancient magic and forgotten lore.

dialogue.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogue.text: I've been searching for this place my whole life. I can feel the power of the ancient ones calling to me.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: A figure emerges from the shadows, a hood pulled over their head and eyes gleaming with an otherworldly intensity.

dialogue.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogue.text: You. I've sensed your presence here too. What brings you to this forsaken place?

dialogue.speaker: Mysterious Figure
dialogue.text: I'm looking for a way to unlock the secrets of this world. And I suspect you might be able to help me.
